content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mary Smith. It's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find my apartment to your liking. Regarding the rental price, I am open to offers that reflect the market value and the quality of the apartment. Would you like to make an initial proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Heine. I've seen similar apartments in the area, and based on my research, I believe a fair price would be around 750 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities. Is this something we could discuss?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Mary, your offer of 750 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities, is a very generous one. However, considering the prime location and the recent renovations I've done to the apartment, I was hoping for a price closer to 900 Euro per month. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Your apartment does indeed have many desirable features, Mr. Heine. While I appreciate the quality and the location, 900 Euro per month is a bit higher than my budget allows. Could we perhaps find a middle ground, say around 800 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities? This would be a more comfortable rate for me.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Mary, your counter-offer of 800 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities, is a step in the right direction. However, I must insist that the 900 Euro per month I initially proposed is a fair reflection of the market value for this apartment. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 850 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Heinrich Heine
